`using var cts = _cts = new();`

`// In this method, we can check whether we are the current operation by doing (cts == _cts)`

What is the situation when `cts != _cts` if we are setting both of them to refer to a same new instance of `CancellationTokenSource` like this - `using var cts = _cts = new();` ?
